name: Magic Items for Starting Characters
guidance: For campaigns starting above level 1, use the Player's Handbook guidance for item counts and rarity.
Choose items yourself, let players choose within the rarity limits, or roll on the random tables.
Use Arcana tables for Sorcerers/Warlocks/Wizards, Armaments for Barbarians/Fighters/Paladins/Rangers, Implements for Bards/Monks/Rogues, and Relics for Clerics/Druids.
Mix tables to fit character themes when appropriate.
